pages.text: On [$(k:use)], the $(item)Sigil of the Captured Soul$() attempts to capture a targeted entity within the sigil. Once the sigil has captured a soul, no further entities can be stored.$(br2)To release the captured soul, [$(k:use)] the $(item)Sigil of the Captured Soul$() while targeting a block.$(br2)$(bold)Cost:$() $(blood)500 LP$()/use
